# append(_:length:)

**Instance Method**

Appends to the receiver a given number of bytes from a given buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
func append(_ bytes: UnsafeRawPointer, length: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **bytes**: A buffer containing data to append to the receiverâ€™s content.
- **length**: The number of bytes from `bytes` to append.

## Discussion

A sample using this method can be found in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/BinaryData/Tasks/WorkingMutableData.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20002150].

## Adding Bytes

- **append(_:)**: Appends the content of another data object to the receiver.
- **increaseLength(by:)**: Increases the length of the receiver by a given number of bytes.
